translation.chat_backup_description: All chat conversations & media are automatically backed up on secure cloud servers and are synced across all your devices. You can continue chat using any device, anytime.
translation.log_out_description: Are you sure you want to logout? You will be logged out of your account.
translation.delete_description: Are you sure you want to Delete your Account?
translation.rete_des: Love this app? Rate the app
translation.name: Name
translation.verify_your_number: Verify your number by receiving a SMS code

translation.muteNotificationExplanation: Other participants will not see that you muted this chat. You will still be notified if you are mentioned.
translation.encryptionMessage: Messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted. No one outside of this chat, not even Tokee, can read or listen to them. Tap to learn more.
translation.inviteContactNotOnTokee: Looks like this contact is not on Tokee yet. Invite them and start chatting.
translation.swipeInstructions: Swipe down to reveal all hidden chats. Swipe down again to hide chats. Long press on a chat to set Alias.
translation.allVideoAndAudioCallDisplay: All video & audio calls display here!
translation.callEndToEndEncryption: This call will be end-to-end encrypted.
translation.updateAppLanguage: Do you want to update your app language?

translation.not_tokee_user_then_invite: Looks like this contact is not on Tokee yet. Invite them and Start chatting.

translation.this_permission_is_requried_for_app_to_f: This permission is required for app to function well. Please enable contacts permission in your App setting.
translation.this_message_will_be_forword_to_tokee: This message will be forwarded to Tokee(Admin)
translation.since_it_is_first_install: Since it is your first install, Please wait for a moment, we are syncing your data with our servers. The wait time may vary depending on the amount of data your account has. We will refresh your friend list automatically.
translation.please_wait_we_are_syncing: Please wait while we sync your chat list to the server. Thank you for your patience.
translation.back_up_your_chat_history_and_media: Back up your chat history and media to Tokee storage. You can restore them on a new phone after you download Tokee on it.
